title: Giant Tales Beyond The Mystic Doors
description: Sixty-one wonderful tales of courage, greed, acceptance, and hope. Take an unexpected journey beyond the mystic doors. Full of suspense and surprise endings, characters venture into mysterious places. Discover unusual sunflowers and how to hang on when life is falling apart. Moving with twists and turns, this work of fiction is a real page-turner. Find out what is inside fifteen mysterious boxes. Terrible beasts wait behind mystic doors. Excellent entertainment. High quality stories. Three-minute tales of fantasy and suspense will keep you turning the pages for more.Enter if you dare beyond the mystic doors!
author: Heather Marie Schuldt
